body: Nothing like taking a bat to that baldies fucking knees, he might not have "stolen" the girl but he still knew that the dude liked her, so he is doing in spite, beat the fuck out of baldie and spit on the dumb cunt for thinking hed want this.

@jokerXY that's not what he meant, dickhead. He meant that It's the feeling of having someone you love stolen, not literally taking her away from him. If everyone wants to read stories about a girlfriend or wife cheat on their spouse go to the fucking "cheating" tag. Which you should note is not on this story btw. Ntr is pretty much just having someone you love taken away(you don't have to be in a relationship to love someone, it can be one sided like this one fyi) which is why it's used almost interchangeably with cheating.

Also, ntr is short for netorare which translates to 'taken away by sleeping' so... yeah
Except she never loved the Mcin the first place so the baldie wasn’t “stealing” anything
*sigh* so many retards here too. You all need to search the term "NTR". The cuck lost his love?? That is NTR cause baldie stole her? Get it??

We got to get are terms correct. One sided love, some dating the girl and secret sex is not ntr. Only thing that sucks in these stories is that the loser never realize it or the friends never say anything.

So... She never liked the cuck? She always loved the baldie but he doesn't want her. He knew his buddy loved her so he only agreed to be his sex friend as long as she's with his buddy? Wow... Well, aside from the 'ntr', baldie just don't want to ruin the current relationship I guess and that's also what the MC chose. Maybe someday, they will tell the truth and all of them become best friends both in the street and on the bed..... Or all of them will go their own ways, that's an option too
The bald dude isn’t really a “bro” if he’s keeping it a secret a real bro would tell the mc they’re in a relationship and they hope it doesn’t make things awkward
lol how many times did this dude coom in one hour
one-sided love and she was actually happy to be his meat urinal, not really ntr

girl never liked the cuck she was thirsty whole time for the other guy he just made a promise to be a meat urinal or something if she was nice to cuck and if he found out they'd break up, so I guess he's a bro cus he didn't want her cus he cares more about the friendship and cuck doesn't say anything either for same reason I guess?
some drama here...hope this gets translated
